Hey guys, couldn't help but notice some of you being upset by a few "spoilers" in the screens and comments. So I felt I should remind you of something..

This is, at best, a sub-par fecal fetish shock-horror tribute to all the terrible, terrible plot lines horror movies have given us.

If you read the part of the summary that goes, "stitching their mouths to each others' rectums" and are watching this film for the.. "plot", you should probably just go download The King's Speech or some other boring crap.

This movie is stupid, gory, and has gratuitous titty bouncing; features three tourists who's torture is to eat each others shit; oh, and the dude dies at the end.

If you still give a damn about anything but seeing what a Shit-tipede looks like, this movie isn't for you.
Someone should seriously seed this awesome torrent...

the tosh.0 30 min spoiler on youtube made me come here to watch this movie.

That's bull about there intentionally being no subtitles for the Japanese guy, btw. Actually some of the best lines come from him, especially when he's struggling. I guess without the subtitles it seems less obvious it's a crazily dark comedy.

This isn't a scary film, but to describe the film better - its sick. Not the "good" sick that Americans use... this is a film that will set your body in motion for being sick.

When you put your mind into whats going on, unless you're a real freak yourself.. then thats the only option you come to. So you have to stop picturing whats happening on this one and remove any empathy you may have.

In the end there's not a great plot, or message. Its just like someone telling you what happens in 2 girls and a cup for an hour and a half.

I got the subs from 1:07, but before that watching the film without subtitles seemed right. If you didn't have them after that point then it'd be weird.

Whilst different... its still no better than 6/10.

For the sound - try downloading VLC player or downloading the kazaa lite codec pack.
